metadata.Title: CVE-2022-45062 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Xfce xfce4-settings before 4.16.4 and 4.17.x before 4.17.1, there is an argument injection vulnerability in xfce4-mime-helper.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-45062` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xfce4-helpers - 4.18.0-1ubuntu1
xfce4-settings - 4.18.0-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xfce4-settings package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.18.0-1ubuntu1').
